derivation: from a compound of G1909 (ἐπιδημέω) and G1218 (ἐπιδημέω);
strongs_def: to make oneself at home, i.e. (by extension) to reside (in a foreign country)
outline:
1. to be present among one's people, in one's city or one's native land
  2. to be a sojourner
    1. of a foreign resident, among any people, in any country
